mng: Li (c. 2000 BC), sixth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God, also known as Ai 哀[Ai1]

exm.mng: the slightest difference leads to a huge loss (idiom), a miss is as good as a mile
exm.pyn: chā zhī háo lí , shī zhī qiān lǐ

exm.mng: the slightest difference leads to a huge error (idiom), a miss is as good as a mile
exm.pyn: chā zhī háo lí , miù yǐ qiān lǐ

exm.mng: a tiny lapse can lead to a huge mistake (idiom); a minor discrepancy leading to enormous losses
exm.pyn: shī zhī háo lí , chà zhī qiān lǐ
